existingLimitOrderDataDescription: This form will update the following JSON data
bitsharesDexSupportDescription: The Bitshares DEX now supports directly editing open limit orders via this form
limitOrderOwnerDescription: This is the account which owns the market order that is being updated.
limitOrderOwnerWarning: ⚠️ You are not logged in as the Bitshares account which owns this limit order.
priceLockHoverCardDescription: Optionally change the limit order price
clickToUnlockDescription: Click the unlock button to begin setting a new price
amountLocked: Currently locked. Using existing amount being sold
updatingAmountBeingSold: Updating the amount of {{baseAssetSymbol}} being sold
wantToUpdateAmountBeingSold: Want to update the amount of {{baseAssetSymbol}} being sold ?
clickToUnlockAmount: Click the unlock button to begin changing the amount you plan on selling
editingTotalAmountBeingSold: Editing the total amount being sold
totalAmountLocked: Currently locked. Using existing total amount
updatingTotalAmountBeingBought: Updating the total amount being bought
wantToUpdateTotalAmountBeingBought: Want to update the total amount of {{quoteAssetSymbol}} being bought ?
existingTotalAmountBeingBought: The existing total amount being bought: {{existingQuoteAmount}} {{quoteAssetSymbol}}
clickToUnlockTotalAmount: Click the unlock button to begin changing the total amount of {{quoteAssetSymbol}} you plan on buying
expirationLocked: Currently locked. Using existing expiration date
wantToUpdateExpiration: Want to update the limit order expiration ?
clickToUnlockExpiration: Click the unlock button to begin changing the limit order expiration
limitOrderExpiry: This limit order will expire {{expiryType}} after broadcast
autoOsoActive: Automatic OSO function will be active
spreadPercentDescription: How far the price of the take profit order differs from the original order
osoRepeatDescription: Automates repeated OSO based limit orders
cancelLimitOrderTitle: Want to cancel this limit order?
cancelLimitOrderDescription: Click here to cancel the limit order {{limitOrderID}}
createNewLimitOrder: Need to create a new limit order?
seekAdditionalMarketData: Or perhaps you seek additional market data?
borrowAssetsDescription: Users may offer to lend you {{quoteAsset}} or {{baseAsset}}.
